text: int main ( ) { int n , num , mat [ 100 ] [ 100 ] , sum = 0 , i , j ; for ( i = 0 ; i < 100 ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j < 100 ; j ++ ) mat [ i ] [ j ] = 0 ; } scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; while ( n -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & num ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < num ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & mat [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } j = 0 ; for ( i = 0 ; i < num ; i ++ ) { if ( ( sum + mat [ i ] [ j ] ) < ( sum + mat [ i ] [ j + 1 ] ) ) { sum = ( sum + mat [ i ] [ j + 1 ] ) ; j = j + 1 ; } } printf ( "%d\n" , sum ) ; } return 0 ; }
